events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department for the software development role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the upcoming hiring steps.
You have successfully passed the initial screening for the software engineer position, and we would like to proceed further.
Thank you for promptly responding with your availability; this helps us coordinate the next steps more efficiently.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our lead software engineer next Monday at 10 AM.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for Wednesday at 2 PM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed good alignment with our company values and expectations.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role, reflecting your skills and experience.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer; we are pleased you find it agreeable.
You have accepted our offer to join as a Software Engineer; welcome to the team!
Your onboarding process has started with access to all necessary resources and welcoming sessions scheduled.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you are officially onboarded as part of our engineering team.
